### CS166 - Ribeiro  {.tabset}
#### LO contribution
How much does a particular LO contribute towards the overall course grades? 
This could help us see if there is any particular LO that weigh disporportionately in a student's course grade. This could easily happen when, for example, there is only 1 LO in a CO and that LO is only graded once with weight 1 (e.g., in-class video assessment). From these graphs we could determine if there is any LO that single handedly kills a student's grades.
```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
whole_class_contrib
hw_grid(
  list_CO_contrib_student,
    ncol = 2
)
```
